name: electroplate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cover the surface of a metal object with a thin layer of a different metal, often silver, using electrolysis (= method that uses electric current): The firm uses chemical baths to electroplate metal products.electroplate something onto something The attractive appearance of silver can be achieved by electroplating silver onto an article made from a cheaper metal such as nickel. electroplated brass
More examplesFewer examplesThe copper sulfate acid solution is used to electroplate copper foil.The printers electroplated the copper sheets with a micron-thin coating of steelThese discs could be played as they were or electroplated in copper.The base onto which the silver is electroplated is a mix of nickel, copper and zinc.His idea was to produce a metal negative of the master cylinder by electroplating a layer of metal onto the wax.

objects that have been electroplated: How do you polish electroplate? The cutlery was not solid silver; it was electroplate.
More examplesFewer examplesThe two common forms of plated silver are Sheffield plate and silverplate or electroplate.Electroplate is formed when a thin layer of pure or sterling silver is deposited electrolytically on the surface of a base metal.
